content.text: Form Test
Collected Generator Entries
These are the entry types collected from the generator entry pages.
Testing
Here is the generator result:
Here is the form generated from the above generator result:
Generator Entries
This page should contain a child page for each form element (and no other child objects). These entries will be collected on the main page.
insertButtonLabel - the name to put on the insert button
generatorEntry - the JSON object to set the generator entry
The pages
checkbox
can be used as a template. The only values that need to be changed are the values in
insertButtonLabel
and
generatorEntry
